<h2 id="fetch_mcp介绍">fetch_mcp介绍</h2>
<p>GitHub地址：<a href="https://github.com/zcaceres/fetch-mcp" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/zcaceres/fetch-mcp</a></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250303124750645-1410692094.png" alt="image-20250303120415257" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>此MCP服务器提供了以多种格式（包括HTML、JSON、纯文本和Markdown）获取网络内容的功能。</p>

<p>是不是很有帮助呢？</p>
<p>让我们在Cline中进行配置吧！！！</p>
<h2 id="在cline中配置fetch_mcp">在Cline中配置fetch_mcp</h2>
<p>要在Cline中配置fetch_mcp，首先得现在本地跑通fetch_mcp。</p>
<p>git clone到本地，用vs code打开。</p>
<p>npm install安装依赖。</p>
<p>npm run build构建项目。</p>
<p>npm start运行项目。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250303124751009-1504126761.png" alt="image-20250303122503204" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>说明成功运行，现在需要在Cline中进行配置。</p>
<p>点击这个：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250303124751049-1286431114.png" alt="image-20250303122557447" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这样配置即可：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250303124751027-1289770859.png" alt="image-20250303122632685" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>换成自己的路径。</p>
<p>如果出现错误，就把node换成本地的node.exe的绝对路径，如下所示：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3288240/202503/3288240-20250303124751038-316199654.png" alt="image-20250303122728031" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>经过以上简单的配置应该就可以为Cline增加获取网页内容的功能了，感兴趣的话就赶紧试试吧！！！</p>
